resources.string: 1. Enter your search Coordinates into the Latitude and Longitude text boxes--> 2. Afterwards hit the search Button 3. A list of locations will load below the search button and you can select one of them.

1. Tap the search bar. Type in something like "Food" or "Tesla".
 

2. Afterwards hit the search Button
 

3. A list of articles will pop up after some loading, you can select one of them and will have the option to "Save to Favourites"
 

4. You can access your saved articles under the Top Right drop down menu (Saved Favourites) where you can re-open them or delete them.
Click star button to save in Favorite List and Delete
Click once to delete from Favorite List

1. Itype ang numero.
 

2. Pumili ng country pera
 

3. pumili ng country kung anung pera
 

4. pindotin ang convert button.
